TopicTitle: If I had early access to ksp updates, I would_____.

Articles.Content:
the game is simple. just say what you would do if you had early access to ksp updates, but before you do, reply to the poster above you.

poster 1: I would make a hypetrain with the new parts

poster 2: Can I have a tiket?. I would burn jeb.

so to start off, I wouldmake a hype train and show it on youtube
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT ON GREGROX! I would mine all the resources so no one else could.
I would steal enough resources to build a massive, game-breaking space station.

I would use said station to- oh wait, the game crashed.

I would do all the things, except those things...
them great things.I would finally start a career.
